targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = $testid 
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''

SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_sla
			, nok_sla
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = $testid 
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_sla >= 0

SELECT 
			  time
			, path
			, name
			, success
			, skipped
			, failed
			, aborted
			, none
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = $testid 
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND success >= 0

SELECT 
			 type
			, SUM(ok_count)
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = $testid 
		  AND (
		  		type = 'MessageInfo'
		  	 OR type = 'MessageWarn'
		  	 OR type = 'MessageError'
		  )
GROUP BY type

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "percent"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'CPU Usage%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "percent"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Host Memory%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "percent"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name = 'Process Memory Usage [%]'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "MB"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Process Memory%[MB]'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "MB"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Network I/O Recv%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "MB"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Network I/O Sent%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "MB"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Disk I/O Read%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "MB"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Disk I/O Write%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "users"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Active'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "users"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Started'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "users"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Stopped'

SELECT 
			  time
			, ok_count as "percent"
			, concat(path, ' ', name) as metric
			
		FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
		WHERE testid = ${testid}
		  AND type = 'System'
		  AND name LIKE 'Disk Usage%'

SELECT 
			  time
			, min(ok_min) as "min"
			, avg(ok_avg) as "avg"
			, percentile_cont(0.90) within group (order by ok_p90 asc) as p90
			, max(ok_max) as "max"
FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
WHERE testid = ${testid}
		AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		AND type != 'User'
		AND type != 'System'
		AND usecase != ''
GROUP BY time

SELECT 
			  time
			, sum(ok_count) as "ok_count"
			, sum(nok_count) as "nok_count"
FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
WHERE testid = $testid 
		AND type != 'User'
		AND type != 'System'
		AND usecase != ''
GROUP BY time

SELECT 
			  time
			,	code
			, sum(ok_count + nok_count) as "count"
FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
WHERE testid = $testid 
		AND type != 'User'
		AND type != 'System'
		AND usecase != ''
		AND code != ''
GROUP BY time, code

SELECT 
		  type
		, name
		, CASE
	          WHEN type IN ('Gauge', 'System', 'User') THEN AVG(ok_count)
	          ELSE SUM(ok_count)
	      END AS "count(ok)"
		, sum(nok_count) as "count(nok)"
		, min(ok_min) as "min"
		, round(avg(ok_avg), 1) as "avg"
		, max(ok_max) as "max"
		, round(avg(ok_stdev), 1) as "stdev"
		, percentile_disc(0.25) within group (order by ok_p25 asc) as p25
		, percentile_disc(0.50) within group (order by ok_p50 asc) as p50
		, percentile_disc(0.75) within group (order by ok_p75 asc) as p75
		, percentile_disc(0.90) within group (order by ok_p90 asc) as p90
		, percentile_disc(0.95) within group (order by ok_p95 asc) as p95
		, percentile_disc(0.99) within group (order by ok_p99 asc) as p99
FROM ${tableprefix}_stats
WHERE testid = $testid 
		AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''  
GROUP BY type, name

list.definition:
SELECT 
      id as "__value"
    , concat(
        to_char(
            to_timestamp(time/1000)
          , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'
        )
        , to_char(
            to_timestamp(endtime/1000)
          , ' to HH24:MI'
        )
        , ' [', name, ']'
      ) as "__text"
FROM ${tableprefix}_tests
ORDER BY time desc
list.label: Test
list.name: testid
list.query:
SELECT 
      id as "__value"
    , concat(
        to_char(
            to_timestamp(time/1000)
          , 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'
        )
        , to_char(
            to_timestamp(endtime/1000)
          , ' to HH24:MI'
        )
        , ' [', name, ']'
      ) as "__text"
FROM ${tableprefix}_tests
ORDER BY time desc

list.description: the prefix of the database tables
list.name: tableprefix
